short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes Web Leads Master easier to use by automatically getting your session cookie

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WLM is a web application that fully automates your workflow on LinkedIn and saves a lot of your time!

This extension will automatically get a session cookie. Once you are in your Web Leads Master profile, just click 'Get my cookie' to save it to your profile.

In case you have any questions or suggestions, drop us a line (hi@webleadsmaster.com).
